price: Kuma a lõkacin da wata al'umma daga gare su ta ce: "Don me kuke yin wa'azi ga mutãne waɗanda Allah Yake Mai halaka su kõ kuwa Mai yi musu azãba, azãba mai tsanani?" Suka ce: "Dõmin nẽman hanzari zuwa ga Ubangijinku, kuma tsammãninsu, sunã yin taƙawa."
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالَتۡ أُمَّةٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ لِمَ تَعِظُونَ قَوۡمًا ٱللَّهُ مُهۡلِكُهُمۡ أَوۡ مُعَذِّبُهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدٗاۖ قَالُواْ مَعۡذِرَةً إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ وَلَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
